author: chris
content: Down 9% from ath and still above 50 dma of 193.  Up about the same amount as S&P 500 for the year. This looks like a needed correction before we go higher.  Great buying opportunity.

author: Fred
content: even a great earnings will not get this trash back to $200

author: Steven
content: Long term hold. It truly is a wonderful company.

author: Roger
content: Amazon will have The Mother of All Blow-Out Quarters this very quarter.  Need to show Walmart a thing or two.

author: BigMac
content: Jassy was a terrible CEO hire. No leadership whatsoever. Comes across as a Socialist rather than an aggressive CEO trying to drive shareholder value. Yet he doesn't seem to mind his obscene compensation especially relative to poor stock performance.
